content: With this MVP race I feel the media has turned greatness into a math problem and algorithm. Which is a shame in that case people can easily manipulate and say this or that stat is arbitrary. Take away all the numbers for just a moment and just see with your eyes and heart as a human being, Russ has given the fans unforgettable moments in the season of heroic performances. Obviously that’s not enough but how can people deny his objective accomplishements or his indivudual and team figures.
